title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Your diplomatic skills are put to the test with sudden conflicts today. Perhaps a friend surprises you with a sharp reaction on a subject where you expect unity. Or, conversely, you align on a topic with a person with whom you often disagree. Keep your cool as jolting Uranus forms a rowdy opposition to pleasing Venus in your 3rd House of Communication. However, the cosmos also reminds you to honor your own truth first, not your allegiance to other peoples beliefs. Astronomer Carl Sagan said, "It pays to keep an open mind, but not so open your brains fall out." Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
